name: dropbox
description: The Dropbox JavaScript SDK is a lightweight, promise based interface to the Dropbox v2 API that works in both nodejs and browser environments.

scripts.publish-docs: rm -rf generated-docs && npm run generate-docs && gh-pages -d generated-docs
scripts.test: npm run test:lint && npm run test:unit
scripts.build: npm run build:cjs && npm run build:es && npm run build:umd && npm run build:umd:min && npm run build:team:umd && npm run build:team:umd:min && npm run generate-tsds
scripts.build:umd: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es NODE_ENV=development rollup -c -i src/index.js -o dist/Dropbox-sdk.js -n Dropbox
scripts.build:team:umd: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es NODE_ENV=development rollup -c -i src/team/index.js -o dist/DropboxTeam-sdk.js -n DropboxTeam
scripts.build:umd:min: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es NODE_ENV=production rollup -c -i src/index.js -o dist/Dropbox-sdk.min.js -n Dropbox
scripts.build:team:umd:min: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es NODE_ENV=production rollup -c -i src/team/index.js -o dist/DropboxTeam-sdk.min.js -n DropboxTeam
scripts.size: npm run size:umd && npm run size:umd:min
scripts.size:umd: echo 'Dropbox-sdk.js gzipped will weigh' $(cat dist/Dropbox-sdk.js | gzip -9 | wc -c | pretty-bytes)
scripts.size:umd:min: echo 'Dropbox-sdk.min.js gzipped will weigh' $(cat dist/Dropbox-sdk.min.js | gzip -9 | wc -c | pretty-bytes)

author: Riley Tomasek
